title: Khuga NFT - Let The Battle Begins!
description: Check out more details about Khuga NFT project and simply scroll down this article for their roadmaps.
author: zortan

body.raw:
## Khuga NFT

Check out [http://khuga.io](http://khuga.io) for more details of the project or simply scroll down this article for their roadmaps.

Follow their Twitter here: [@KhugaNFT](https://x.com/KhugaNFT).
 
### Let The Battle Begins!
